summary: Climates Of Tamriel Lore Friendly Enb.
descriptionHtml:
Guys ,

[IMG]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/27010-2-1353165014.jpg[/IMG]

This is my Enb for climates of tamriel ,I have tried to have a balance between colour,performance, in the enb.Thanks to boris ,Kyokushinoyama,opethfield and matso for the bloom and dof,fxaa settings and jjc71 for climates of tamriel .

Installation-
1.download d3d9.dll ver 0.119 from http://www.enbdev.com/enbseries_skyrim_v0119.zip and put in your skyrim main directory

2-Extract The photo realistic enb.rar  file to your skyrim main directory

3Enable nvdia ssao using nvdia inspector.

4.use nvdia high quality AF using nvdia inspector.

5-Make sure to check the below specifications on your SkyrimPrefs.ini file, under your MyDocuments/MyGames/Skyrim folder:

bFloatPointRenderTarget=1

6.Start the game as adminstrator in windows 7 and 8

Recommended mods-
1-I recommend using climates of tamriel level 1 nights and hazardous dungeons ,cold interiors with this enb
2-Skyrim Bigger trees is also a gem

Changelog-
added a natural version.
Final-Improved Sky gradients and interiors.
1-Added a preset with brighter interior .
author: khudilo
